com.logicmonitor.spm.dao.impl

Class StockHistoryDAOImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.logicmonitor.spm.dao.impl.BaseDAOImpl<CompanyDTO>
      • com.logicmonitor.spm.dao.impl.StockHistoryDAOImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseDAO<CompanyDTO>, StockHistoryDAO

    @Repository
 @PropertySource(value="classpath:stock-info-queries.properties")
public class StockHistoryDAOImpl
extends BaseDAOImpl<CompanyDTO>
implements StockHistoryDAO
    DAO implementation to retrieve the stock information from the database
    Author:
    Supraj

      • getAllCompanies

        @Transactional
public java.util.List<CompanyInfo> getAllCompanies()
                                                            throws StorageException
        Retrieves the names of all companies that are monitored with their last updated stock price
        Specified by:
        getAllCompanies in interface StockHistoryDAO
        Returns:
        List of CompanyInfo objects which contains the company name, symbol and last updated stock price
        Throws:
        StorageException - If there was an exception while retrieving the data

      • getCompanyHistory

        @Transactional
public java.util.List<StockDetailsDTO> getCompanyHistory(java.lang.String symbol)
                                                                  throws StorageException
        Retrieves the historical information of a company
        Specified by:
        getCompanyHistory in interface StockHistoryDAO
        Parameters:
        symbol - The stock symbol of the company. Example - Microsoft - MSFT
        Returns:
        The list of StockDetailsDTO objects which contains the history of stock prices for a given company symbol
        Throws:
        StorageException - If there was an exception while retrieving the data
